apicoming: MyPort API service is under final testing. It's almost ready. Stay tuned.

about.head: About MyPort Website and Public API
about.desc: MyPort Website is Chinnathorn's online Portfolio. It's design on React JS framework (Operated by Netlify)  and run undered by ASP.Net Core 3.1 Web API. We also have Public API called 'MyPort API' to access our contents similiar this site focused.
about.uptLog: Update description: New Layout is beta.

settingGuide.perfor: Enable this feature will be reduce motion graphic and transition and better performance
settingGuide.cReg: System will be detect the fastest server region to serve client
settingGuide.cLat: Latency is time duration from request to server region until response data to client. Lower number is better.
